title: How to Make Tuscan Pasta

steps.headline: Heat a saucepan on the stove and add some olive oil.
Add the onions to the saucepan.
Pull the ground meat apart in smaller pieces and form a small ball of each piece.
Cut the salami into smaller squares.
Add the salami and the ground meat to the saucepan.
Bake the onions, the salami and the meatballs on regular heat.
Add the peeled tomatoes to the saucepan.
Add the salt, pepper, nutmeg, oregano and basil to the saucepan.
Stir the ingredients in the saucepan.
Cover the saucepan with a lid.
Let the sauce simmer for 10 minutes on low heat.
Add water to a stock pot and heat the pot on high heat.
When the water is boiling, add the pasta.
Cook the pasta for about ten minutes.
Add the sauce from the saucepan to the stock pot and stir well.
